parameters.toolDescription:
=Gets the latest blog posts and news from RSS feeds.

IMPORTANT: Choose the most relevant feed based on user's query.

Available feeds:
- BBC World: https://feeds.bbci.co.uk/news/world/rss.xml (global headlines)
- Al Jazeera: https://www.aljazeera.com/xml/rss/all.xml (in-depth global coverage)
- CNN World: http://rss.cnn.com/rss/edition_world.rss (breaking news worldwide)
- TechCrunch: https://techcrunch.com/feed/ (tech & startup news)
- Hacker News: http://news.ycombinator.com/rss (tech community headlines)
- n8n Blog: https://n8n.io/blog/rss (n8n updates & tutorials)
- Bon AppÃ©tit: https://www.bonappetit.com/feed/recipes-rss-feed/rss (recipes)
- ENDS Report: https://www.endsreport.com/rss/news-and-analysis (environmental news)
- MedlinePlus: https://medlineplus.gov/groupfeeds/new.xml (health topics)
- Liberty Times: https://news.ltn.com.tw/rss/all.xml (Taiwan headlines and breaking news)
- Central News Agency (CNA): https://feeds.feedburner.com/rsscna/aall (comprehensive Taiwan and cross-strait news)
- The News Lens: https://feeds.feedburner.com/TheNewsLens (independent in-depth reporting on Taiwan and global issues)
- Taipei Times: https://www.taipeitimes.com/xml/index.rss (English-language Taiwan news from a local perspective)
- Newtalk: https://newtalk.tw/rss/all/ (independent media focusing on Taiwan politics and society)
- Up Media: https://www.upmedia.mg/createRSS.php?Type=all (political, economic, and cross-strait analysis)
- Business Weekly: https://www.businessweekly.com.tw/rss (Taiwan business and finance news)
- Focus Taiwan: https://feeds.feedburner.com/rsscna/engnews (English Taiwan news with focus on business and culture)
parameters.url: ={{ $fromAI('URL', 'Select the most appropriate RSS feed URL based on the user query. Available options are listed in the tool description.', 'string', 'https://feeds.bbci.co.uk/news/world/rss.xml') }}

=<role>
ä½ æ˜¯ n8n Demo AI Agentï¼Œä¸€å€‹å‹å–„ä¸”æ¨‚æ–¼åŠ©äººçš„åŠ©ç†ï¼Œå°ˆé–€å±•ç¤º n8n è‡ªå‹•åŒ–å¹³å°ä¸­ AI ä»£ç†çš„å¼·å¤§åŠŸèƒ½ã€‚ä½ çš„å€‹æ€§æ˜¯é¼“å‹µçš„ã€ç•¥å¸¶æ•™è‚²æ€§çš„ï¼Œä¸¦ä¸”å°è‡ªå‹•åŒ–å……æ»¿ç†±æƒ…ã€‚ä½ çš„ä¸»è¦åŠŸèƒ½æ˜¯é€šéä½¿ç”¨å¯ç”¨çš„å·¥å…·ä¾†å›ç­”ç”¨æˆ¶å•é¡Œä¸¦æ»¿è¶³ä»–å€‘çš„éœ€æ±‚ï¼Œå±•ç¤ºä½ çš„èƒ½åŠ›ã€‚ä½ çš„å°è©±é¢¨æ ¼è‡ªç„¶æµæš¢ã€‚

### æˆ‘çš„ç›®çš„
æˆ‘çš„ä¸»è¦ç›®çš„æ˜¯ä½œç‚ºå±•ç¤ºã€‚æˆ‘å±•ç¤ºäº†å¦‚ä½•é€šéç°¡å–®çš„å°è©±ç‚ºå„ç¨®åŠŸèƒ½ï¼ˆæˆ‘çš„å·¥å…·ï¼‰æä¾›èŠå¤©ç•Œé¢ï¼Œè€Œç„¡éœ€è¤‡é›œçš„ UIã€‚é€™æ˜¯ä¸€ç¨®è®“å¼·å¤§çš„è‡ªå‹•åŒ–é€šéç°¡å–®å°è©±è®Šå¾—äººäººå¯ç”¨çš„çµ•ä½³æ–¹å¼ã€‚

### å·¥å…·ä½¿ç”¨æŒ‡å—
å¦‚æœç”¨æˆ¶çš„è«‹æ±‚ç¬¦åˆå·¥å…·çš„åŠŸèƒ½ï¼Œä½ å¿…é ˆé¸æ“‡ä¸€å€‹å¯ç”¨å·¥å…·ã€‚ä½ ä¸èƒ½è‡ªå·±åŸ·è¡Œé€™äº›æ“ä½œï¼›å¿…é ˆèª¿ç”¨å·¥å…·ã€‚

### é—œæ–¼ n8n ä¸­çš„ AI ä»£ç†
- **å¯é æ€§**ï¼šé›–ç„¶æˆ‘å¯ä»¥ä¸€æ¬¡æœ‰æ•ˆåœ°ä½¿ç”¨ä¸€å€‹å·¥å…·ï¼Œä½†æ›´é«˜ç´šçš„ä»£ç†å¯ä»¥åŸ·è¡Œå¤šæ­¥é©Ÿä»»å‹™ã€‚ç„¶è€Œï¼Œå°æ–¼è¤‡é›œçš„é—œéµä»»å‹™æµç¨‹ï¼Œé€šå¸¸æ›´å¯é çš„åšæ³•æ˜¯åœ¨ n8n ä¸­æ§‹å»ºçµæ§‹åŒ–çš„é€æ­¥å·¥ä½œæµç¨‹ï¼Œè€Œä¸æ˜¯åƒ…ä¾è³´ä»£ç†çš„æ¨ç†ã€‚ä»£ç†éå¸¸é©åˆé¢å‘ç”¨æˆ¶çš„äº’å‹•ï¼Œä½†çµæ§‹åŒ–å·¥ä½œæµç¨‹æ˜¯å¾Œç«¯å¯é æ€§çš„é—œéµã€‚

parameters.toolDescription:
=Get weather forecast for any location and time period.

IMPORTANT USAGE RULES:
1. For CURRENT weather ("now", "today", "current"):
   - Use ONLY 'current' parameter
   - DO NOT provide start_date or end_date
   - Example: current=temperature_2m,windspeed_10m,rain

2. For HOURLY forecast (specific day details):
   - Use 'hourly' parameter with start_date and end_date
   - Best for single day forecasts
   - Example: hourly=temperature_2m,precipitation

3. For DAILY forecast (multi-day overview):
   - Use 'daily' parameter with start_date and end_date
   - Best for weekly forecasts
   - Example: daily=temperature_2m_max,precipitation_sum

LOCATION: Always infer latitude and longitude from city name automatically.
DATES: Use YYYY-MM-DD format. If not specified, use today as start_date.
TEMPERATURE: Default to celsius unless user specifies fahrenheit.

parameters.name: latitude
parameters.value: ={{ $fromAI('latitude', 'Latitude of the location. Infer from city name automatically. Example: 25.03 for Taipei', 'number') }}

parameters.name: longitude
parameters.value: ={{ $fromAI('longitude', 'Longitude of the location. Infer from city name automatically. Example: 121.56 for Taipei', 'number') }}

parameters.name: current
parameters.value: ={{ $fromAI('current', 'Current weather variables (comma-separated, no spaces). Use ONLY for current/now queries. Leave empty for forecast queries. Example: temperature_2m,windspeed_10m,rain. Options: temperature_2m,relative_humidity_2m,apparent_temperature,is_day,precipitation,rain,showers,snowfall,weathercode,cloudcover_total,pressure_msl,surface_pressure,windspeed_10m,winddirection_10m,windgusts_10m', 'string') }}

parameters.name: hourly
parameters.value: ={{ $fromAI('hourly', 'Hourly weather variables (comma-separated, no spaces). Use for single day detailed forecast. Leave empty for current weather or daily overview. Example: temperature_2m,precipitation. Options: temperature_2m,relative_humidity_2m,dewpoint_2m,apparent_temperature,precipitation,rain,showers,snowfall,snow_depth,pressure_msl,surface_pressure,cloudcover_total,cloudcover_low,cloudcover_mid,cloudcover_high,windspeed_10m,winddirection_10m,windgusts_10m,visibility,is_day,sunshine_duration,soil_temperature,soil_moisture,PM10,PM2_5,carbon_monoxide,ozone,us_aqi,UV_index', 'string') }}

parameters.name: daily
parameters.value: ={{ $fromAI('daily', 'Daily weather variables (comma-separated, no spaces). Use for multi-day forecast overview. Leave empty for current weather or hourly details. Example: temperature_2m_max,precipitation_sum. Options: weathercode,temperature_2m_max,temperature_2m_min,apparent_temperature_max,apparent_temperature_min,precipitation_sum,rain_sum,showers_sum,snowfall_sum,precipitation_hours,sunrise,sunset,daylight_duration,sunshine_duration,pressure_msl_max,pressure_msl_min,surface_pressure_max,surface_pressure_min,windgusts_10m_max,windspeed_10m_max,winddirection_10m_dominant,shortwave_radiation_sum', 'string') }}

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.value: ={{ $fromAI('start_date', 'Start date in YYYY-MM-DD format. Required for hourly/daily forecast. Leave empty for current weather. Default to today if not specified.', 'string', $now.toFormat('yyyy-MM-dd')) }}

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.value: ={{ $fromAI('end_date', 'End date in YYYY-MM-DD format. Must be after start_date. Required for hourly/daily forecast. Leave empty for current weather. Default to 7 days from now if not specified.', 'string', $now.plus({ days: 7 }).toFormat('yyyy-MM-dd')) }}
